mapper.delete: delete from interest_sale_tb where user_id=#{userId} and aptCode=#{aptCode}
mapper.select: select avgDealAmount, avgArea, i.aptCode aptCode, apartmentName aptName, address from interest_sale_tb i inner join (select round(avg(hd.dealAmount), 3) avgDealAmount, round(avg(hd.area)) avgArea, hd.aptCode, tmp.apartmentName apartmentName, address from housedeal hd inner join (SELECT hi.aptCode, hi.apartmentName, concat(sidoName," ",gugunName, " ",dong, " ",roadName," ",jibun) address FROM houseinfo hi INNER JOIN dongcode dc ON hi.dongCode = dc.dongCode ) tmp on tmp.aptCode = hd.aptCode group by hd.aptCode ) tmp2 on i.aptCode = tmp2.aptCode where i.user_id = #{userId}
